channel.title: mysql on Huanghuang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on Huanghuang's Blog

item.title: MariaDB安装
item.description: MariaDB安装 platform: Centos7 Install 1 yum install -y mariadb-server MariaDB配置使用 Using 1 2 systemctl start mariadb.service # 启动 systemctl enable mariadb.service # 开机自启 Configure 首先是设置密码，会提示先输入密码 Enter current password for root (enter for none):

item.title: Mysql安装配置
item.description: Mysql安装 版本: 8.0 添加源 1 yum local install https://repo.mysql.com//mysql80-community-release-el7-1.noarch.rpm 安装 1 yum install mysql-community-server Mysql配置 启动mysql 1 systemctl start mysqld 设置mysql开机自启 1 systemctl enable mysqld 查看初始密码 1 grep 'temporary password' /var/log/mysqld.log 进

item.title: Sqlalchemy使用注意
item.description: 遇到in查询之类的批量删除或者更新，可以使用synchronize_session=False 1 db.session.delete(synchronize_session=False) 使用find_in_set 1 2 3 from sqlalchemy.sql.expression import func db.session.query(Post).filter(func.find_in_set('10',
